name: The Clinic
description:
SnagType Studios presents

Pizza Jam II Theme: Memory

You run a small clinic out in the woods performing illegal memory restoration surgeries. One evening, you come across a particularly interesting patient...


Controls -

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

LMB - Interact/Shoot

RMB - Deploy Gunpods

Space - Jump

Team - 
  • Reg Chou- 3d Models
  • Katie Johnson - Art
  • James Lee - Programming
  • Robert Lytle - Level Design
  • Christine Nguyen - Story
